## PreflightTest.getState() method

Get the state of the PreflightTest.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getState(): Promise<PreflightTest.State>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PreflightTest.State](./voice-react-native-sdk.preflighttest_namespace.state_enum.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A Promise that - Resolves with the current state of the PreflightTest. - Rejects if the native layer encountered an error.
